Text: Introducing NASDAQ Index TIERS sm BNASDAQ Index TIERS sm PrincipalProtected Trust Certificates TIERS Nasdaq PrincipalProtected Trust Certificates are securities whose return is linked to the performance of the Nasdaq Index At maturity the Trust is scheduled to repay the entire principal amount of the certificates plus an amount based on the return of the Nasdaq Index subject to a quarterly appreciation cap of Payment to the trust will be guaranteed pursuant to the terms of a financial guaranty insurance policy issued by Ambac Assurance Corporation Expected to be Aaa rating by Moodys and AAA rating by Standard Poors Expected to be priced April Expected offering price is per certificate For more information and a copy of the prospectus please go to tiers or Speak with a Specialized Product Representative at ext from am to pm PDT When held to maturity A registration statement relating to these securities has been filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission but has not yet become effective These securities may not be sold nor may offers to buy be accepted prior to the time the registration statement becomes effective This communication shall not constitute an offer to sell or the solicitation of an offer to buy nor shall there be any sales of these securities in any jurisdiction in which the offer solicitation or sale would be unlawful prior to registration or qualification under the securities laws of any such State TIERS is a registered service mark of Salomon Smith Barney Charles Schwab Co Montgomery Street San Francisco CA To unsubscribe from the BondSource emails please reply to this message with Unsubscribe in the Message Body For your protection we are unable to accept instructions to change your email address sent in reply to this message To change your address please log in to your account using the link below From there you will be able to update your email information securely tradingstartSANCROSEmail Notice All email sent to or from the Charles Schwab corporate email system may be retained monitored andor reviewed by Schwab personnel c Charles Schwab Co Inc All rights reserved Member SIPCNYSE

Information re Schwab Access Account BSignature ServicesTM Client Your Schwab AccessTM account has been opened You should receive a package containing instructions for using your account and your account number within business days For security reasons we cannot send your account number via email If you are opening both a new Schwab One and a Schwab Access account you will receive information for each account separately You will also receive the following packages and features within business days Schwab Access checks Gold VisaR debit card if requested Schwab BillPayTM package if requested For security you will receive the PIN number for your Gold Visa debit card shortly after you get your card You will also receive a separate mailing with your Schwab BillPay security code To get a feel for the experience and features of your new account testdrive the demo at accessdemo Logging in to Your New Account Once you have your new account number log into the Customer Center by clicking on tradingstart Enter your digit account number and temporary password the last digits of your Social Security number To protect your account remember to establish your own unique password immediately after logging in for the first time For Customers Who Already Have a Schwab One Account Please make sure that you have funded your new Schwab Access account to adequately cover your outstanding transactions Any outstanding Schwab One checks Visa debit card transactions ATM withdrawals and bill payments are now debited to your Schwab Access account If you need to move funds between accounts log into schwabcom click on Move Money and then Between Schwab Accounts Contact Us If you have any questions about your Schwab Access account please call or contact Schwab Signature Services We thank you for choosing Schwab C Charles Schwab Co Inc All rights reserved Member SIPCNYSE NOTICE All email sent to or from Charles Schwab corporate email system is subject to archival monitoring andor review by Schwab personnel

Introducing the Optical Equipment NETS BPartners and Charles Schwab are pleased to bring you a new product offering NETS New Era Trust Securities Each NETS represents ownership of Optical Equipment companies in varying share amounts These companies are expected to include Cisco Systems Inc CSCO Nortel Networks Corporation NT Lucent Technologies Inc LU Corning Incorporated GLW Juniper Networks Inc JNPR JDS Uniphase Corporation JDSU CIENA Corporation CIEN SDL Inc SDLI Sycamore Networks Inc SCMR Redback Networks Inc RBAK ADC Telecommunications Inc ADCT ONI Systems Corp ONIS Avanex Corporation AVNX Finisar Corporation FNSR New Focus Inc NUFO Newport Corporation NEWP MRV Communications Inc MRVC Stratos Lightwave Inc STLW Digital Lightwave Inc DIGL Avici Systems Inc AVCI Corvis CORV JDS Uniphase is expected to acquire SDL for shares of JDS for share of SDL The transaction is expected to close in the December quarter Expected to be offered the week of November Expected offering price is NETS For more information and a copy of the prospectus go to nets or speak with a Retail IPO Services representative by calling from am to pm ET A registration statement relating to these securities has been filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission but has not yet become effective These securities may not be sold nor may offers to buy be accepted prior to the time the registration statement becomes effective This communication shall not constitute an offer to sell or the solicitation of an offer to buy nor shall there be any sales of these securities in any jurisdiction in which the offer solicitation or sale would be unlawful prior to registration or qualification under the securities laws of any such jurisdiction Epoch Partners an investment bank is the Managing Underwriter for this NETS offering If you would prefer to receive only account service emails please reply to this email indicating your preference Please note doing so will not remove you from any SchwabAlerts or email newsletters to which you have actively subscribed Notice All email sent to or from the Charles Schwab corporate email system and may be retained monitored andor reviewed by Schwab personnel c Charles Schwab Co Inc All rights reserved Member SIPCNYSE c Epoch Partners Member NASDSIPC NETS and New Era Trust Securities are service marks of Epoch Partners
